TopicTitle: Would you buy expansion packs for KSP? How much?

Articles.Content:
I am curious to see whether or not the community would buy expansions for KSP? Personally, I would be quick to buy any expansion for KSP if it was under 25 USD.

EDIT: I am looking for the general consensus of the community on purchasing expansions or KSP

EDIT2: Assume the expansion contains complete features such as, colonization, multiplayer, or terraforming

In short, something you would want to pay for

Edited August 14, 2013 by ngianoplus
I would, but I bought KSP before May 1st of 2013. (I believe anyone who bought it before then are entitled to get any expansions for free)
So am I, I am just wondering

It's hard to imagine what an expansion for KSP would even have at this point, since we don't even have a definite lock on what the game will feature in the near future. You should probably ask this again once Career mode is fleshed out enough that we have actual missions we can run...

I would, but I bought KSP before May 1st of 2013. (I believe anyone who bought it before then are entitled to get any expansions for free)

I'm also in the same category... But if it ever happened, I would pay money to support the devs.
Really depends on what the expansion pack added to the game. Also, because I bought KSP last year I apparently don't need to buy any expansion packs because I will get them free.
I should get expansions for free AFAIK, but I would still buy them.

I'd gladly buy DLC (once KSP is done) for $20 or less. Unfortunately, I bought KSP almost a year ago, and in March there was the decision to let anyone who bought before May get free DLC and Expansions, which is not something I think we deserve.

I may be a frugal person, but I'm not a fan of the decision to give pre-May 2013 purchasers free expansions. I try to spend as little as I can, but if someone clearly puts a lot of effort into something that I think could be worth a lot more and then is essentially forced to give it away then I won't support it.
I'm a Pre-may orderer... Even if I don't need to pay, I want to support this game the best I can!

If, down the road, KSP is a finished polished product, and they start putting out content packs, I would probably get them. I'd pay as much as $15 certainly.
